San Antonio Summerland Hotel
7.7 Very good
Based on 49 reviews

staff is amazingly friendly (special thanks to Stefi who is awesome!) . Shuttle to town every 2 hours, 24 hours.

Pool area is a great place to chill and get a tan :) Will be back there, Lior and Gilad

Royal Olympic Hotel
8 Very good
Based on 221 reviews

My wife and I really liked this hotel. We were going to stay at the Hilton but the Royal Olympic was better.

The staff was helpful and the free breakfast on the roof top restaurant very nice and was served buffet style. The free wifi was a bonus. I just wish they had in room coffee makers. I liked the room upgrade they gave us for our 5 night stay

Herodion Hotel
8.7 Excellent
Based on 88 reviews

Fantastic! I would highly recommend this hotel. The view of the Acropolis, especially at night. The dinners on the roof where the staff remembered what we had to drink from the night before even though they only met us once.

I would certainly stay here again.

We enjoyed our three nights at this hotel. Breakfast was good, location of the hotel is amazing (easy walking distance to all the historical sites).

very friendly and attentive staff. so many selection for the breakfast which are all delish. they can arrange for taxi too going to the airport.

location is in the center and walking distance to the metro station. nice interior too. recommended.

Philippos Hotel
8.8 Excellent
Based on 54 reviews

Everything was great during our stay. The most important feature of a hotel for me is the toilet and they have very clean toilet.

Although the rooms are small but the cleanliness compensates for it.

Show more
Maria Joanna Victoria Yap Gonzalez , Philippines
Divani Palace Acropolis Hotel
8.1 Excellent
Based on 78 reviews

Good hotel in a great location, accessible to all the main sites and shopping. Pool was not great was in shade most of the day and had a ridiculous rule prohibiting swimming between 2.

30pm and 5.30pm. I was not aware of this and went for a swim at 2.35 there was a staff waiting for me telling to to leave the pool. Yet at 5.25pm a woman and her child were able to swim quite noisily waking everyone up. At least enforce the exact time for everyone. Whilst I understand this time is the local rest period, for most foreign visitors this is when a guest wants to cool down and relax after a hot morning sightseeing. Otherwise good hotel, very spacious and comfortable rooms, would recommend it.

Show more

Madalena Hotel
8.2 Excellent
Based on 106 reviews

I was most impressed of the helpful, sincere and friendly staff, not any single staff but all are helpful! This is of great importance! Nice design of room and surroundings, real money worthy!

Breakfast is pretty good and the whole environment is clean. Value for money

A For Athens Hotel
9.1 Exceptional
Based on 114 reviews

First hotel stop on our Greek adventure and it was the perfect way to kick off our holiday. The location is right off of Monastiraki Square so it's super central and a great place to start to navigate the city.

Splurge for the acropolis view if it is in your budget - totally worth it!

Our stay was most enjoyable. Hotel is close to the Plaza but on a side street so not noisy or congested.

Very comfortable room. Welcoming staff.

The Athens Gate Hotel
8.8 Excellent
Based on 175 reviews

The hotel is good and the location is nearby to any tourist attraction. You wil have it all, when you stay at this hotel.

The hotel facility & services is excellent (from A to Z), from my first arrival (early check-in)until my departure (early check-out). The hotel location is very closed to many tourist attractions such as The Acropolis Museum, Acropolis Artifact, Plaka & Syntagma Square.

We had an amazing couple of nights at Alexander's. When we arrived they immediately bumped us up to the Diamond Suite because some other travellers had come in last minute.

No problem for us! The suite was a dream, so romantic and quite. The staff could not have been more friendly and helpful. Yan (I believe that was his name) helped me to rent a car and plan our days. I cannot recommend this place highly enough.

khair rahman , Singapore
On the Cliff
7.6 Very good
Based on 1 reviews

Oia Mare Villas
8.1 Excellent
Based on 40 reviews

My stay at Oia Mare Villas was incredible. The staff went above and beyond to meet me at the local bus station in Oia and carry my luggage (which was not lightweight) to the hotel.

The staff introduced themselves by first name and were consistently readily available to answer any questions. The breakfast buffet in the morning was delicious and had a great variety in comparison to other hotels where breakfast is included and extremely limited. The pool area and view from the Oia Mare Villas is unmatched and incredibly gorgeous. An added bonus is the donkey rides from Ammoudi Bay stop right by the entrance to the villas!

ERIK KIELER , Denmark
Nefeli Homes
8.8 Excellent
Based on 11 reviews

Ikastikies Suites
9.4 Exceptional
Based on 47 reviews

We stayed at this amazing cave house in April this year. The staff greeted us at the carpark to take our luggage to our apartment.

We arrived early but the apartment was already ready and waiting. George is the owner of the establishment and he made us feel welcome every day. He took the time to explain the sights and had time for a little chat everytime that he sees us. Albert is his assistant who looks after our daily requirements and delivered our beautifully presented breakfast every morning. Albert is always ready with a smile and his service is always prompt and reliable. Our stay was so much more memorable because of the service. The view was jaw-dropping and the excellent service just enhanced our stay that much more. Highly recommended... don't look anywhere else! PS: George, if you are reading this... thank you so so much for delivering the platter to the airport. I stupidly left it behind and it is a lovely memento of our stay in Santorini. Hope to see you one day soon!

Show more

We spent our last night on Santorini in this hotel and we were very happy. The manager was very helpful and accommodating, the breakfast was served on our balcony and was delicious.

The room is comfortable and clean. The hotel is situated in the centre of Fira city and restaurants and shopping is just around the corner. It is also not in the middle of the noisiest clubs and bars so it is quiet.

More about Greece

If you are looking for a holiday destination in Europe, then Greece is the place to go, offering something for everyone. Agoda.com understands that traveler want to get the best deal. That's why we offer you the best online rates at 17328 hotels nationwide. Consisting of 53 regions, each with its own unique appeal, the country offers visitors plenty of different areas to explore. While any city is sure to excite, Athens, Santorini, Mykonos go above and beyond to capture your attention. Sweet deals are just a click away when you use Agoda.com to book your next trip to Greece.

Shuttle to town every 2 hours, 24 hours. Pool area is a great place to chill and get a tan :) Will be back there, Lior and Gilad Show more lior shamir , Israel Santo Maris Oia - Luxury Suites & Spa 9 Excellent Based on 13 reviews La Perla Villas Hotel 9.6 Exceptional Based on 10 reviews Royal Olympic Hotel 8 Very good Based on 221 reviews My wife and I really liked this hotel. We were going to stay at the Hilton but the Royal Olympic was better. The staff was helpful and the free breakfast on the roof top restaurant very nice and was served buffet style. The free wifi was a bonus. I just wish they had in room coffee makers. I liked the room upgrade they gave us for our 5 night stay Show more James Coll , United States Dionysos Hotel 7.1 Very good Based on 21 reviews Herodion Hotel 8.7 Excellent Based on 88 reviews Fantastic! I would highly recommend this hotel. The view of the Acropolis, especially at night. The dinners on the roof where the staff remembered what we had to drink from the night before even though they only met us once. I would certainly stay here again. Show more Carol Penta , United States Electra Palace Hotel Athens 8.5 Excellent Based on 80 reviews We enjoyed our three nights at this hotel. Breakfast was good, location of the hotel is amazing (easy walking distance to all the historical sites). Chambula Dorji , Bhutan Athens Tiare Hotel 8.4 Excellent Based on 14 reviews Athina Luxury Suites 8.4 Excellent Based on 21 reviews Grecotel Pallas Athena 8.9 Excellent Based on 59 reviews very friendly and attentive staff. so many selection for the breakfast which are all delish. they can arrange for taxi too going to the airport. location is in the center and walking distance to the metro station. nice interior too. recommended. Show more Jennete Camalig , Philippines Philippos Hotel 8.8 Excellent Based on 54 reviews Everything was great during our stay. The most important feature of a hotel for me is the toilet and they have very clean toilet. Although the rooms are small but the cleanliness compensates for it. Show more Maria Joanna Victoria Yap Gonzalez , Philippines Divani Palace Acropolis Hotel 8.1 Excellent Based on 78 reviews Good hotel in a great location, accessible to all the main sites and shopping. Pool was not great was in shade most of the day and had a ridiculous rule prohibiting swimming between 2. 30pm and 5.30pm. I was not aware of this and went for a swim at 2.35 there was a staff waiting for me telling to to leave the pool. Yet at 5.25pm a woman and her child were able to swim quite noisily waking everyone up. At least enforce the exact time for everyone. Whilst I understand this time is the local rest period, for most foreign visitors this is when a guest wants to cool down and relax after a hot morning sightseeing. Otherwise good hotel, very spacious and comfortable rooms, would recommend it. Show more Matina Curtis , Australia Madalena Hotel 8.2 Excellent Based on 106 reviews I was most impressed of the helpful, sincere and friendly staff, not any single staff but all are helpful! This is of great importance! Nice design of room and surroundings, real money worthy! Michele Chui , Hong Kong Theoxenia Boutique Hotel 9 Excellent Based on 18 reviews Mykonos Princess Hotel 9.1 Exceptional Based on 22 reviews I would say this hotel is more than five star service. Clean and secluded from mykonos town but the port view is great. Breakfast is pretty good and the whole environment is clean. Value for money Show more lam chee wai , Malaysia Sofitel Athens Airport Hotel 8.5 Excellent Based on 496 reviews Best hotel for airport transfers Paramee Junsang , Thailand Mykonos Essence Hotel 8.3 Excellent Based on 9 reviews Grecotel Creta Palace 9.2 Exceptional Based on 3 reviews A For Athens Hotel 9.1 Exceptional Based on 114 reviews First hotel stop on our Greek adventure and it was the perfect way to kick off our holiday. The location is right off of Monastiraki Square so it's super central and a great place to start to navigate the city. Splurge for the acropolis view if it is in your budget - totally worth it! Show more Lorena Macias , United States Athens Cypria Hotel 8.1 Excellent Based on 150 reviews Our stay was most enjoyable. Hotel is close to the Plaza but on a side street so not noisy or congested. Very comfortable room. Welcoming staff. Show more Thomas Kral , United States The Athens Gate Hotel 8.8 Excellent Based on 175 reviews The hotel is good and the location is nearby to any tourist attraction. You wil have it all, when you stay at this hotel. The hotel facility & services is excellent (from A to Z), from my first arrival (early check-in)until my departure (early check-out). The hotel location is very closed to many tourist attractions such as The Acropolis Museum, Acropolis Artifact, Plaka & Syntagma Square. We had previously stated her and had a great holiday. The staff again were excellent and moth he as too much trouble. Would definitely return. Show more Liz Thorp , United Kingdom Katikies Hotel 9.4 Exceptional Based on 14 reviews Alexander's Boutique Hotel 8.1 Excellent Based on 89 reviews We had an amazing couple of nights at Alexander's. When we arrived they immediately bumped us up to the Diamond Suite because some other travellers had come in last minute. No problem for us! The suite was a dream, so romantic and quite. The staff could not have been more friendly and helpful. Yan (I believe that was his name) helped me to rent a car and plan our days. I cannot recommend this place highly enough. Hotel is clean, the staff very helpful and the breakfast buffet was excellent. Highly recommended. When I need help, they always lend a helping paw. The location is great at the heart of the center, you can reach everywhere you want, and the view of the sky bar is so good as well, I will definitely stay in here next time. :) Show more CHAO-YI HUANG , Taiwan Enalion Suites 9 Excellent Based on 4 reviews Colours Of Mykonos 10 Exceptional Based on 2 reviews Villa Libertad 8.4 Excellent Based on 1 reviews Villa Maria Damigou 9 Excellent Based on 17 reviews Gianna Suites 8.4 Excellent Based on 7 reviews Costa Marina Villas 9.1 Exceptional Based on 16 reviews Aerino Villa 8.6 Excellent Based on 8 reviews Kymata 8.4 Excellent Based on 170 reviews Sweet Pop 8.8 Excellent Based on 19 reviews Langas Villas 8 Very good Based on 4 reviews Cyclades Hotel 8 Very good Based on 9 reviews Iriana Apartments 7.4 Very good Based on 3 reviews Xenia Residence & Suites 9.6 Exceptional Based on 190 reviews Douskos Guesthouse 9.3 Exceptional Based on 3 reviews Thirea Suites 9.1 Exceptional Based on 4 reviews White Myth 8 Very good Based on 2 reviews Ampelonas Apartments 8 Very good Based on 1 reviews Nissos Thira 7.8 Very good Based on 8 reviews Bluetopia Suites 9.7 Exceptional Based on 67 reviews Katerina Traditional Rooms 9.6 Exceptional Based on 1 reviews Black Diamond Suites 9.6 Exceptional Based on 155 reviews Myconian Inn 8.1 Excellent Based on 3 reviews Tania Villa 8.8 Excellent Based on 2 reviews Argonaftes 9.1 Exceptional Based on 25 reviews Andriani's Guest House 8.4 Excellent Based on 5 reviews Fira Blue Horizon 6.6 Good Based on 3 reviews Nitsa Rooms 8.1 Excellent Based on 24 reviews Aigli Villa 8.3 Excellent Based on 8 reviews Aqua Luxury Suites 9 Excellent Based on 25 reviews where do I start ? Excellent with breath taking view !!!!Extra comfortable, and warm as if we were in our home. , made extra loving by warm staff and lovely food! Staff always ready to help when ever and where ever we needed A perfect paradise Show more Jaideep Tiwari , Australia Exclusive Plan Suites 9.2 Exceptional Based on 13 reviews I wish i have santorini baby khair rahman , Singapore On the Cliff 7.6 Very good Based on 1 reviews Oia Mare Villas 8.1 Excellent Based on 40 reviews My stay at Oia Mare Villas was incredible. The staff went above and beyond to meet me at the local bus station in Oia and carry my luggage (which was not lightweight) to the hotel. The staff introduced themselves by first name and were consistently readily available to answer any questions. The breakfast buffet in the morning was delicious and had a great variety in comparison to other hotels where breakfast is included and extremely limited. The pool area and view from the Oia Mare Villas is unmatched and incredibly gorgeous. An added bonus is the donkey rides from Ammoudi Bay stop right by the entrance to the villas! Show more Madeline Hogan , United States Gt Suites Corfos Bay 7.2 Very good Based on 1 reviews Callia Caves 9.2 Exceptional Based on 1 reviews Ikies Traditional Houses 9.3 Exceptional Based on 4 reviews Mill Houses Elegant Suites 8.9 Excellent Based on 72 reviews A wonderful experience ERIK KIELER , Denmark Nefeli Homes 8.8 Excellent Based on 11 reviews Ikastikies Suites 9.4 Exceptional Based on 47 reviews We stayed at this amazing cave house in April this year. The staff greeted us at the carpark to take our luggage to our apartment. We arrived early but the apartment was already ready and waiting. George is the owner of the establishment and he made us feel welcome every day. He took the time to explain the sights and had time for a little chat everytime that he sees us. Albert is his assistant who looks after our daily requirements and delivered our beautifully presented breakfast every morning. Albert is always ready with a smile and his service is always prompt and reliable. Our stay was so much more memorable because of the service. The view was jaw-dropping and the excellent service just enhanced our stay that much more. Highly recommended... don't look anywhere else! PS: George, if you are reading this... thank you so so much for delivering the platter to the airport. I stupidly left it behind and it is a lovely memento of our stay in Santorini. Hope to see you one day soon! Show more Joanne Salim , Australia Aqua & Terra Traditional Cave Houses 9.1 Exceptional Based on 34 reviews Kamares Apartments 9.3 Exceptional Based on 10 reviews Helianthus Suites- Caldera Caves 9.8 Exceptional Based on 6 reviews Santorini Mansion at Imerovigli 8 Very good Based on 2 reviews Captain John 9.2 Exceptional Based on 133 reviews Marizan Caves & Villas 9 Excellent Based on 14 reviews Salty Houses 9.6 Exceptional Based on 9 reviews Santorini View 9 Excellent Based on 23 reviews We spent our last night on Santorini in this hotel and we were very happy. The manager was very helpful and accommodating, the breakfast was served on our balcony and was delicious. The room is comfortable and clean. The hotel is situated in the centre of Fira city and restaurants and shopping is just around the corner. It is also not in the middle of the noisiest clubs and bars so it is quiet.
